name: Truelogic Software LLC
description:
WHO WE ARE
Truelogic, an Inc. 5000 Company and ISO Certified, is a software development firm founded in 2003 by Marcelo Tribuj & Maritn Kornblum. Today, Truelogic has two development centers strategically located in New York & Buenos Aires, Argentina. 100% of the company's clients are US based, due to the similar culture and timezone.
WHAT WE DO
With over a decade of experience, Truelogic has developed over 1000 projects for all sorts of companies, from small startups to FORTUNE 100 corporations. The team is built with 120+ full time software engineers with a minimum of 4 years experience, that speak fluent English and work under the Agily Methodology.
Truelogic's flexible structure allows to work either on Staff Augmentation or Fixed Bid Projects, depending on the client's best interest. The core technologies are: Java, .NET, PHP, RoR, Python, NodeJS, AngularJS, ReactJS, HTML5, iOS, Android, Windows Phone, Ionic and Xamarin.
STRONG EXPERIENCE
High Performance Platform Design and Development
Websites (multiple CMS)
eCommerce Platforms
Native and Hybrid Mobile Application Development
Integrations
Cloud
UI/UX
